osvSchema.details: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in TvRock 0.9t8a. An arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user accessing the website that uses the product. Note that the developer was unreachable, therefore, users should consider stop using TvRock 0.9t8a.

description_data.value: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in TvRock 0.9t8a. An arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user accessing the website that uses the product. Note that the developer was unreachable, therefore, users should consider stop using TvRock 0.9t8a.

descriptions.value: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in TvRock 0.9t8a. An arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user accessing the website that uses the product. Note that the developer was unreachable, therefore, users should consider stop using TvRock 0.9t8a.

Existe una vulnerabilidad de Cross-site scripting en TvRock 0.9t8a. Se puede ejecutar un script arbitrario en el navegador web del usuario que accede al sitio web que utiliza el producto. Tenga en cuenta que el desarrollador era inalcanzable, por lo tanto, los usuarios deberían considerar dejar de usar TvRock 0.9t8a.
